text: O vy, yaki uviruvaly! Yakshcho vidstupytʹ khtosʹ iz vas vid svoyeyi relihiyi, to Allah shvydko yavytʹ lyudey, yakykh lyubytʹ Vin i yaki lyublyatʹ Yoho, y budutʹ vony smyrennymy pered viruyuchymy y nepokhytnymy pered neviruyuchymy, bortsyamy na shlyakhu Allaha, i tymy, khto ne boyitʹsya osudu. Taka laska Allaha! Daye Vin yiyi, komu pobazhaye. Allah — Vseosyazhnyy, Vseznayuchyy
